WorkPlace.Name: Colo ApS
WorkPlace.Description:
Colo ApS beskæftiger sig med Executive Search, Search & Selection samt beslægtede konsulentydelser inden for privat og offentlig virksomhed. Virksomheden har kunder over hele landet.
Få yderligere informationer om Colo ved at besøge hjemmesiden: www.colo.dk.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Product and Application Specialist, Technical Sales
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Hoyer, Hadsten

Do you want to be part of an international company with focus on both customers and employees? Do you want to work with B2B customers and do you have comprehensive experience with electrical motors? Then Hoyer could be your new place of work!

Hoyer is an organization with activities in Europe, Asia and North America – in your everyday work life you will meet colleagues from all over the world. Hoyer is characterized by a strong drive and ambitions to always deliver the best service to our customers. At the same time Hoyer want to be a good place to work – every day – and employee satisfaction is high on the agenda. You are at eye level with your boss and you get to work in teams across both departments and national borders.

Hoyer is looking for a skilled Product and Application Specialist for our Technical Sales team at our head office in Hadsten. You will become part of an international team which also includes a technical department in China.

Technical support to Sales departments in Europe and Asia

As part of the Technical Sales department in Europe, you will be working closely with our Internal and External Sales departments providing day-to-day support in a fast-paced environment. You will be the anchor point between the Technical and Sales departments relaying and interpreting information in both directions. Your main assignments are:

  • Being a trusted technical advisor for the Sales teams regarding technical inquiries.
  • Being the daily gatekeeper between Sales and Technical/SCM to relay technical information effectively and accurately.
  • Managing multiple technical enquiries and preparing solution proposals at short notice.
  • Verifying, that products meet customer technical specifications in cooperation with Sales.

You will become part of a dynamic team consisting of seven employees in Hadsten, Denmark and seven employees in Ningbo, China.

Technical experience and interest in sales

You have technical knowledge, insight and interest in the application and performance of electric motors, preferably with a Bachelor in Electrical Engineering or in Technology Management and Marine Engineering. You should have a natural interest in sales and in supporting/advising our customers. You take responsibility and respect deadlines. Furthermore you are characterized by the following:

  • Structured and detail oriented.
  • Highly motivated and self-driven.
  • Strong communicator – especially in technical English.
  • You thrive in a busy, changing environment.

Hoyer offer you:

  • Good teamwork.
  • Modern company culture.
  • International working environment.
  • Strong brand within electrical motors.
  • Committed and experienced colleagues.
  • Good employee conditions.
  • Exciting and versatile work tasks.

Looking forward to receiving your CV + other relevant documents (Word/pdf format).

Applications will be treated as confidential information.
